title: TD Bank (US)
description:
Bank anywhere, anytime with the TD Bank app for personal and business accounts.

The TD Bank app has a fresh new look that makes banking more convenient than ever. Get on-the-go access to your accounts and all your favorite banking features.

• View account balances and activity
• Move around and explore the app with ease
• Review account and credit card statements
• Deposit checks anywhere, anytime with two quick pictures
• Pay bills to cards, companies, and people
• Lock and unlock credit, debit, and ATM cards
• Add your credit, debit, and ATM cards to your Digital Wallet
• Explore and open new accounts
• Send Money with Zelle® to family and friends
• Transfer money between your accounts
• Customize TD Alerts to stay up to date on your account activity
• Access account settings and change personal information
• Access TD for Me, TD Bank personalized, to get info on accounts, events, tips and special offers
• Connect to customer service 24/7 with Call Us, Virtual Assistant, Secure Messages, and appointment booking

By tapping "Install" you consent to the installation of the TD Bank (US) app provided by TD Bank, N.A. and to any future updates/upgrades. You are also acknowledging that you understand that the TD Bank (US) app and any future updates/upgrades will/may perform the functions described below at TD Bank, N.A.'s sole discretion. You may withdraw your consent at any time by deleting or uninstalling this app.

TD Bank, N.A. Member FDIC

summary: The TD app provides quick, easy, secure access to your TD Bank accounts.
